newsitem.title: NAMIBIA: NAMIBIAN STOCKS WEEK - Shares mixed in active trade.
newsitem.headline: NAMIBIAN STOCKS WEEK - Shares mixed in active trade.

text.p: Namibia's two share indices showed a mixed trend after an active week with the Overall Index slipping to 233.03 from 239.26 a week earlier but the Local Index up at 152.17 from 151.59.
Active business saw 235,300 FNB shares trade for N$6.5 million at the beginning of the week and 36,000 Standard Bank shares were traded between N$180 and N$175 each.
Among local companies, 378,884 CIC shares traded at N$2.90 and 5,500 Namibia Breweries traded at N$2.50.
The total value of shares traded in the week was N$17.6 million with a volume of 1,003,184 shares.
